#define define_swapx ( x,
xtype   ) 
Value:
static xtype                            \
TOKEN_PASTE(swap,x)(xtype z)            \
{                                       \
    xtype r;                            \
    xtype *zp;                          \
    unsigned char *s, *t;               \
    int i;                              \
                                        \
    zp = xmalloc(sizeof(xtype));        \
    *zp = z;                            \
    s = (unsigned char*)zp;             \
    t = xmalloc(sizeof(xtype));         \
    for (i=0; i<sizeof(xtype); i++) {   \
        t[sizeof(xtype)-i-1] = s[i];    \
    }                                   \
    r = *(xtype *)t;                    \
    xfree(t);                           \
    xfree(zp);                          \
    return r;                           \
}
